page.title: 10SATURDAYS IN CLEETHORPES
page.content: On {Saturdays}I wake up and think,"Oh brilliant,there's no school!" I lie there for a while then go downstairs and get the newspaper and my {Roy of {the Rovers }comic. I read my comic and the paper while I'm watching {Duran {Duran}on video. After that I have a cup of coffee and a piece of toast. I then get dressed. I always put my jeans and sweatshirt on. I put on my trainers and jacket and then I cycle to my friend's house. There is one friend who I always play with.We often go for a bike ride. After that we go in for dinner.I watch{football}on television while I'm eating my vegetable soup.Afterwards my dad gives me some money and I go and see{Grimsby {Town}play football at{Blundell Park.}I go home and watch television before I have my tea. At about ten o'clock I finally get ready for bed.
